nodes.bodyText: Kinda, but they are single purpose endpoints. HTTP has a path, a method and headers, so the one deployment will generally provide a few different function (e.g. even a simple CRUD endpoint for a single entity will have different methods for GET, PUT, DELETE etc). IMHO difference between a function and server-less HTTP is that a function only done one thing. If you want to do CRUD with functions you need 4 different functions, one for each operation, while for HTTP you have a single endpoint that handles different methods.
